actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend sections 203 and 204 of the Communications Act of 1934.

summary.text: Authorizes the Federal Communications Commission to enter upon a hearing concerning the lawfulness of any new or revised charge, classification, regulation, or practice. Authorizes the suspension of the operation of such charge classification, regulation or practice, but not for a period of longer than 9 months, pending such hearing and a decision. Permits the Commission to allow all or part of a charge, classification regulation, or practice to go into effect on a temporary basis pending further order of the commission.

titles.title: A bill to amend sections 203 and 204 of the Communications Act of 1934.
